survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners regarding their satisfaction with public charging infrastructure, including ease of use, availability, and reliability.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: This question helps gauge frequency of use, which can indicate reliance on public infrastructure.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What type of public charging stations do you typically use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Understanding preferred charging types can inform infrastructure improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question, with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What type of public charging stations do you typically use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Identifying common challenges can highlight areas for improvement.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question, with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging infrastructure?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide valuable qualitative insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field for this question.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging infrastructure?
